SELECT collect_info.*, user_info.`name`, user_info.images, post_info.images AS postImages, post_info.title, post_info.content, post_info.tag_ids, ui2.`name` AS collectUser, ui2.images AS collectImages, GROUP_CONCAT( tag_info.`name` ) AS tagNames FROM collect_info LEFT JOIN user_info ON ( user_info.id = collect_info.user_id ) LEFT JOIN post_info ON ( post_info.id = collect_info.post_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = post_info.user_id ) LEFT JOIN tag_info ON FIND_IN_SET( tag_info.id, post_info.tag_ids ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND post_info.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.title},'%')
AND ui2.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.collectUser},'%')
AND user_info.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.postUserName},'%')
ORDER BY collect_info.create_date DESC
